title: Fresh Tomato & Basil Pasta
short_description: Enjoy a light and refreshing tomato and basil pasta, perfect for a quick and healthy meal in under 15 minutes.
ingredients: A handful of fresh basil leaves

steps.title: Cook Pasta
steps.description: Cook the spaghetti according to package instructions until al dente. Drain and set aside.

steps.title: Prepare Sauce
steps.description: While pasta cooks, in a large bowl, combine chopped tomatoes, minced garlic, basil leaves, olive oil, salt, and pepper.

steps.title: Combine and Serve
steps.description: Toss the cooked spaghetti with the tomato mixture. Serve warm or at room temperature, topped with grated Parmesan if desired.
